fields.title: Busy busy...
fields.content: Sorry it has been a long time since my last post. I have been really busy watching TV, playing video games and drinking beer. ![busy worm](/media/andablog/images/inchworm.png "busy worm")
fields.preview_content: A post full of excuses. Helpful for me (the author) but not you (the reader). Thanks!
fields._preview_content_rendered: A post full of excuses. Helpful for me (the author) but not you (the reader). Thanks!
fields._content_rendered: Sorry it has been a long time since my last post. I have been really busy watching TV, playing video games and drinking beer.

fields.title: Welcome!
fields.content:
Hi, with this blog I intend to share my personal details and those of my friends. Sign up if you would like your personal details divulged as well.

![guy waving welcome](/media/andablog/images/welcome.png "welcome")
fields._content_rendered: Hi, with this blog I intend to share my personal details and those of my friends. Sign up if you would like your personal details divulged as well.

fields.title: Last post
fields.content:
Hey everyone, I have recently received a heart felt letter from a Nigerian prince. 

![crown](/media/andablog/images/crown.png "crown")

The letter contained a plea for monetary help in claiming his late father's throne from his estranged brother. Included was a promise that I will receive a large amount of money in thanks once the throne is secure. Not only did I immediately send him the required funds but I have also decided to liquidate my assets in order to travel to Nigeria so that I may personally assist with the succession.

![Rich and struting](/media/andablog/images/rich_strut.png "Rich and struting")

As a result, I fear I won't have time for this blog any more. I wish you all the best of luck.
fields._content_rendered:
Hey everyone, I have recently received a heart felt letter from a Nigerian prince.

The letter contained a plea for monetary help in claiming his late father's throne from his estranged brother. Included was a promise that I will receive a large amount of money in thanks once the throne is secure. Not only did I immediately send him the required funds but I have also decided to liquidate my assets in order to travel to Nigeria so that I may personally assist with the succession.

As a result, I fear I won't have time for this blog any more. I wish you all the best of luck.
fields.preview_content:
A story of a neglected work of art and a new fortune discovered. Inside you will find:

- A new opportunity
- A farewell
